EmailTemplate.name: ScanAttendee Welcome Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Scan Attendee - Your registration was successful
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sign up confirmation and next steps
Hello {!Name},
Welcome to Scan Attendee App!
We're excited to offer you a complete suite of mobile and cloud based apps for your events including Lead Retrieval, Check In and Match Making apps.
Please do not hesitate to contact us if you need further assistance.
Technical Problems? Contact support@boothleads.com 1-(800)-492-1289
